title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Outline the museum exhibits, interactivity features, VR technology, and user experience requirements.

title: Design VR Environment and User Interface
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for the virtual museum environment and user interface.

title: Develop VR Museum Experience Backend
description: Build the backend infrastructure to support the museum exhibits, user interactions, and data storage.

title: Implement Museum Exhibits
description: Develop the actual museum exhibits using 3D models, animations, and other VR technologies.
dependencies: Design VR Environment and User Interface

title: Integrate User Interface with Backend
description: Connect the frontend user interface to the backend infrastructure for seamless interaction.
dependencies: Design VR Environment and User Interface

title: Test Virtual Museum Experience
description: Perform thorough testing of the virtual museum experience to ensure smooth functionality, user experience, and performance.

title: Deploy and Launch Virtual Museum Experience
description: Prepare the virtual museum experience for deployment, ensuring it is optimized for performance and accessibility.

title: Review and Iterate on User Feedback
description: Analyze user feedback and iterate on the virtual museum experience to improve its functionality, usability, and overall user satisfaction.
dependencies: Deploy and Launch Virtual Museum Experience
